verses.kjv: And the LORD said unto Aaron, Thou and thy sons and thy father’s house with thee shall bear the iniquity of the sanctuary: and thou and thy sons with thee shall bear the iniquity of your priesthood.
verses.ct: The LORD told Aaron, "You, your sons, and your father's family will be held responsible for any violations related to the sanctuary. You and your sons will also be held accountable for any failures in your priestly duties.

verses.kjv: And thy brethren also of the tribe of Levi, the tribe of thy father, bring thou with thee, that they may be joined unto thee, and minister unto thee: but thou and thy sons with thee shall minister before the tabernacle of witness.
verses.ct: Bring your relatives from the tribe of Levi — your ancestral tribe — to join you and assist you. But only you and your sons may serve directly in front of the tabernacle of the testimony.

verses.kjv: And they shall keep thy charge, and the charge of all the tabernacle: only they shall not come nigh the vessels of the sanctuary and the altar, that neither they, nor ye also, die.
verses.ct: They will carry out their duties under your direction and take care of the entire tabernacle. However, they must not go near the sacred objects or the altar, or both they and you will die.

verses.kjv: And they shall be joined unto thee, and keep the charge of the tabernacle of the congregation, for all the service of the tabernacle: and a stranger shall not come nigh unto you.
verses.ct: They will work alongside you and handle the responsibilities of the tent of meeting, doing all the work connected to the tabernacle. No unauthorized person may come near where you serve.

verses.kjv: And ye shall keep the charge of the sanctuary, and the charge of the altar: that there be no wrath any more upon the children of Israel.
verses.ct: You must take care of the duties related to the sanctuary and the altar so that God's anger never falls on the Israelites again.

verses.kjv: And I, behold, I have taken your brethren the Levites from among the children of Israel: to you they are given as a gift for the LORD, to do the service of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.ct: Look — I myself have selected your fellow Levites from among the Israelites. They are given to you as a gift dedicated to the LORD, to carry out the work of the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: Therefore thou and thy sons with thee shall keep your priest’s office for everything of the altar, and within the vail; and ye shall serve: I have given your priest’s office unto you as a service of gift: and the stranger that cometh nigh shall be put to death.
verses.ct: But you and your sons must personally handle all the priestly duties — everything related to the altar and everything behind the curtain. You will serve there because I am giving you the priesthood as a gift. Any unauthorized person who approaches will be put to death."

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Aaron, Behold, I also have given thee the charge of mine heave offerings of all the hallowed things of the children of Israel; unto thee have I given them by reason of the anointing, and to thy sons, by an ordinance for ever.
verses.ct: Then the LORD said to Aaron, "Pay attention — I am also putting you in charge of the contributions brought to me. All the sacred offerings that the Israelites set apart, I am giving to you and your sons because of your anointing. This is a permanent regulation.

verses.kjv: This shall be thine of the most holy things, reserved from the fire: every oblation of theirs, every meat offering of theirs, and every sin offering of theirs, and every trespass offering of theirs which they shall render unto me, shall be most holy for thee and for thy sons.
verses.ct: Here is what belongs to you from the most holy offerings kept back from the fire: every grain offering, every sin offering, and every guilt offering that the people present to me will be most holy, and it belongs to you and your sons.

verses.kjv: In the most holy place shalt thou eat it; every male shall eat it: it shall be holy unto thee.
verses.ct: You must eat it in a most holy place. Every male may eat it. You are to treat it as holy.

verses.kjv: And this is thine; the heave offering of their gift, with all the wave offerings of the children of Israel: I have given them unto thee, and to thy sons and to thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: every one that is clean in thy house shall eat of it.
verses.ct: This also belongs to you: the contributions that the Israelites present as wave offerings. I have given these to you, your sons, and your daughters as a permanent provision. Everyone in your household who is ceremonially clean may eat from them.

verses.kjv: All the best of the oil, and all the best of the wine, and of the wheat, the firstfruits of them which they shall offer unto the LORD, them have I given thee.
verses.ct: I am giving you the finest olive oil, the finest new wine, and the finest grain — the first portions of what the people offer to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And whatsoever is first ripe in the land, which they shall bring unto the LORD, shall be thine; every one that is clean in thine house shall eat of it.
verses.ct: The earliest produce of their land that they bring to the LORD will be yours. Everyone in your household who is ceremonially clean may eat it.

verses.kjv: Every thing devoted in Israel shall be thine.
verses.ct: Everything in Israel that is completely devoted to God will belong to you.

verses.kjv: Every thing that openeth the matrix in all flesh, which they bring unto the LORD, whether it be of men or beasts, shall be thine: nevertheless the firstborn of man shalt thou surely redeem, and the firstling of unclean beasts shalt thou redeem.
verses.ct: Every firstborn — whether human or animal — that is presented to the LORD will be yours. However, you must always accept a payment to redeem every firstborn son, and you must also accept payment for the firstborn of unclean animals.

verses.kjv: And those that are to be redeemed from a month old shalt thou redeem, according to thine estimation, for the money of five shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary, which is twenty gerahs.
verses.ct: When they are 1 month old, you must accept the redemption payment for them. The price is set at 5 shekels of silver, measured by the sanctuary standard, which is 20 gerahs per shekel.

verses.kjv: But the firstling of a cow, or the firstling of a sheep, or the firstling of a goat, thou shalt not redeem; they are holy: thou shalt sprinkle their blood upon the altar, and shalt burn their fat for an offering made by fire, for a sweet savour unto the LORD.
verses.ct: But you must not accept a redemption payment for the firstborn of a cow, a sheep, or a goat — those are holy. You must splash their blood against the altar and burn their fat as a fire offering, producing an aroma that pleases the LORD.

verses.kjv: And the flesh of them shall be thine, as the wave breast and as the right shoulder are thine.
verses.ct: Their meat, however, belongs to you, just as the breast of the wave offering and the right thigh belong to you.

verses.kjv: All the heave offerings of the holy things, which the children of Israel offer unto the LORD, have I given thee, and thy sons and thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: it is a covenant of salt for ever before the LORD unto thee and to thy seed with thee.
verses.ct: All the sacred contributions that the Israelites present to the LORD, I am giving to you, your sons, and your daughters as a permanent provision. This is an unbreakable covenant from the LORD, lasting forever for you and your descendants."

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Aaron, Thou shalt have no inheritance in their land, neither shalt thou have any part among them: I am thy part and thine inheritance among the children of Israel.
verses.ct: The LORD also told Aaron, "You will not receive any land as an inheritance among the Israelites, and you will have no portion of territory among them. I am your portion and your inheritance among the Israelites.

verses.kjv: And, behold, I have given the children of Levi all the tenth in Israel for an inheritance, for their service which they serve, even the service of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.ct: Now look — I am giving the Levites every tithe collected in Israel as their inheritance, in exchange for the work they do serving at the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: Neither must the children of Israel henceforth come nigh the tabernacle of the congregation, lest they bear sin, and die.
verses.ct: From now on, the rest of the Israelites must not approach the tent of meeting, or they will be guilty of sin and will die.

verses.kjv: But the Levites shall do the service of the tabernacle of the congregation, and they shall bear their iniquity: it shall be a statute for ever throughout your generations, that among the children of Israel they have no inheritance.
verses.ct: Only the Levites are to perform the service of the tent of meeting, and they will bear the responsibility for any violations. This is a permanent rule for every generation: the Levites will receive no land inheritance among the Israelites.

verses.kjv: But the tithes of the children of Israel, which they offer as an heave offering unto the LORD, I have given to the Levites to inherit: therefore I have said unto them, Among the children of Israel they shall have no inheritance.
verses.ct: Instead, I am giving the Levites the tithes that the Israelites present as contributions to the LORD. That is their inheritance. That is why I told them they would receive no land inheritance among the Israelites."

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: Thus speak unto the Levites, and say unto them, When ye take of the children of Israel the tithes which I have given you from them for your inheritance, then ye shall offer up an heave offering of it for the LORD, even a tenth part of the tithe.
verses.ct: "Tell the Levites this: 'When you receive the tithes from the Israelites that I have assigned to you as your inheritance, you must set apart a contribution for the LORD — a tenth of the tithe you receive.

verses.kjv: And this your heave offering shall be reckoned unto you, as though it were the corn of the threshingfloor, and as the fulness of the winepress.
verses.ct: Your contribution will be credited to you as if it were grain from your own threshing floor or juice from your own winepress.

verses.kjv: Thus ye also shall offer an heave offering unto the LORD of all your tithes, which ye receive of the children of Israel; and ye shall give thereof the LORD’s heave offering to Aaron the priest.
verses.ct: In this way, you too must present a contribution to the LORD from all the tithes you collect from the Israelites. You must give the LORD's portion from these tithes to Aaron the priest.

verses.kjv: Out of all your gifts ye shall offer every heave offering of the LORD, of all the best thereof, even the hallowed part thereof out of it.
verses.ct: From everything given to you, you must set aside the LORD's contribution — the best and holiest part of each gift.'

verses.kjv: Therefore thou shalt say unto them, When ye have heaved the best thereof from it, then it shall be counted unto the Levites as the increase of the threshingfloor, and as the increase of the winepress.
verses.ct: Also tell them, 'Once you have set aside the best portion, the remainder will be credited to you Levites just like the produce of a threshing floor or a winepress.

verses.kjv: And ye shall eat it in every place, ye and your households: for it is your reward for your service in the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.ct: You and your families may eat it anywhere, because it is your compensation for your work at the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: And ye shall bear no sin by reason of it, when ye have heaved from it the best of it: neither shall ye pollute the holy things of the children of Israel, lest ye die.
verses.ct: As long as you set aside the best part first, you will not be guilty of sin because of it. But if you fail to do this, you will be defiling the sacred offerings of the Israelites, and you will die.'"
